content:
Only the validator 3 contains "." and a filename that doesn't contain ".". So if someone doesn't escape the dot, all tests pass, but validator fails. 
Editing test 3, so that it uncovers this problem too.

âœ… Approved the contribution.
Comment: awesome dude keep going...

âœ… Approved the contribution.
Comment: This is a medium-hard problem, so it will probably challenge most of the clashers attempting it.
This is also a well known feature used by programmers and non-programmers in text editors and other tools, so it's nice to implement it yourself for once :)
Because it is a string-matching problem, there are multiple approaches to solve it (regex, loops, maps, etc.), which can lead to a great variance in answers, which can lead to a great learning experience for those who read others code at the end of a battle.
I myself enjoyed solving it very much.
great puzzle, but not sure that reverse mode is applicable here
